data: `minecraft:behavior.avoid_mob_type` allows the entity to run away from other entities that meet the criteria specified.

data.Name: avoid_mob_sound
data.Description: The sound event to play when the mob is avoiding another mob.

data.Name: avoid_target_xz
data.Description: The next target position the entity chooses to avoid another entity will be chosen within this XZ Distance.

data.Name: avoid_target_y
data.Description: The next target position the entity chooses to avoid another entity will be chosen within this Y Distance.

data.Name: entity_types
data.Description: The list of conditions another entity must meet to be a valid target to avoid.

data.Name: ignore_visibilty
data.Description: Whether or not to ignore direct line of sight while this entity is running away from other specified entities.

data.Name: max_dist
data.Description: Maximum distance to look for an avoid target for the entity.

data.Name: max_flee
data.Description: How many blocks away from its avoid target the entity must be for it to stop fleeing from the avoid target.

data.Name: on_escape_event
data.Description: Event that is triggered when escaping from a mob.

data.Name: probability_per_strength
data.Description: Percent chance this entity will stop avoiding another entity based on that entity's strength, where 1.0 = 100%.

data.Name: remove_target
data.Description: Determine if we should remove target when fleeing or not.

data.Name: sound_interval
data.Description: The range of time in seconds to randomly wait before playing the sound again.

data.Name: sprint_distance
data.Description: How many blocks within range of its avoid target the entity must be for it to begin sprinting away from the avoid target.

data.Name: sprint_speed_multiplier
data.Description: Multiplier for sprint speed. 1.0 means keep the regular speed, while higher numbers make the sprint speed faster.

data.Name: walk_speed_multiplier
data.Description: Multiplier for walking speed. 1.0 means keep the regular speed, while higher numbers make the walking speed faster.
